actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to recognize the organization known as the Non Commissioned Officers Association of the United States of America.

summary.text: Grants a Federal charter to the Non Commissioned Officers Association of the United States of America, Incorporated.
